title: From combat to space: Foundation Robotics’ Mike LeBlanc talks humanoids
description:
Mike LeBlanc, co-founder of Foundation Robotics and a U.S. Marine Corps veteran, shares insights from his entrepreneurial journey.

The post From combat to space: Foundation Robotics’ Mike LeBlanc talks humanoids appeared first on The Robot Report.
